# Pres23RodoLaTeX

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Pres23RodoLaTeX is to present an introduction to LaTeX and programs to generate PDF output using LaTeX.

## Installation

You can install the development version of Pres23RodoLaTeX like so:

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MiguelRodo/Pres23RodoLaTeX")
```
